function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of public awareness and education about preventive measures and accurate information","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, higher risk of infection, and potential panic","Mitigation":"Active communication, engagement, and education through trusted sources, and promotion of positivity","Technologies":"Public health communication platforms, social media campaigns, and remote learning technologies","People":"General public","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Failure to follow established protocols and safety procedures by healthcare workers","Impact":"Increased risk of infection, spread of diseases within healthcare facilities, and compromised patient care","Mitigation":"Enforcement of safety protocols, provision of necessary protective equipment, and mental health support for healthcare workers","Technologies":"Healthcare management systems, telemedicine, and mental health support apps","People":"Healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions and governing bodies"}]}
